gurmukhi: Kg KMf ibhMfM Kl dl KMfM Aiq rx mMfM br bMfM ]
transliteration: Khag Khanndbihanndan Khal Dal Khanndan At(i) Ran Mandan Bar Bandan||
translation: The sword chops well, chops the forces of fools and this mighty one bedecks and glorifies the battlefield.

gurmukhi: Buj dMf AKMfM qyj pRcMfM joiq AmMfM Bwn pRBM ]
transliteration: Bhuj Dand Akhannddan Tej Prachannddan Jot(i) Amanndan Bhaan Prabhan||
translation: It is the unbreakable staff of the arm, it has the powerful luster and its light even bedims the radiance of the sum.

gurmukhi: suK sMqw krxM durmiq drxM iklibK hrxM Ais srxM ]
transliteration: Soukh Santaa Karanan Durmat(i) Daranan Kilbikh Haranan As(i) Saranan||
translation: It brings happiness to the saints, mashing the vicious ones, it is the destroyer of sins and I and under its refuge.

gurmukhi: jY jY jg kwrx siRsit aubwrx mm pRiqpwrx jY qygM ]2]
transliteration: Jai Jai Jag Kaaran Sristtee Oubaaran Mam Pratipaaran Jai Tegadg||2||
translation: Hail, hail to the cause of the world, saviour of the universe, it is my preserver, I hail its victory. 2.

gurmukhi: sdw eyk joqMXw AjunI srUpM ] mhw dyv dyvM mhw BUp BUpM ]
transliteration: Sadaa Ek Jotyan Ajoonoo Daroopan|| Mahaa Dev Devan Mahaa Bhoop Bhoopan||
translation: He, who is ever light-incarnate and birthless entity, Who is the god of chief gods, the king of chief kings.

gurmukhi: inrMkwr inqXw inrUpM niRbwxM ] klM kwrxyXM nmo KVg pwxM ]3]
transliteration: Nirankaar Nityan Niroopan Nribaanan|| Kalan Kaarneyan Namo Khadag Paanan||3||
translation: Who is Formless, Eternal, Amorphous and Ultimate Bliss. Who is the Cause of all the Powers, I salute the wielder of the Sword.3.

gurmukhi: inrMkwr niRibkwr inqXwM inrwlM ] n biRDM ibsyKM n qrunM n bwlM ]
transliteration: Nirankaar Nribikaar Nityan Niraalan|| Na Bridhanbisekhanndna Tarounan Na Baalan||
translation: He is Formless, Flawless, eternal and Non-aligned. He is neither distinctively old, nor young nor immature.

gurmukhi: n rMkM n rwXM n rUpM n ryKM ] n rMgM n rwgM ApwrM AByKM ]4]
transliteration: Na Rankan Na Raayan Na Roopan Na Rekhan|| Na Ranadg Na Raagadg Apaaran Abhekhaan||4||
translation: He is neither poor. nor rich; He is Formless and Markless. He is Colourless, Non-attached, Limitless and Guiseless.4.

gurmukhi: n rUpM n ryKM n rMgM n rwgM ] n nwmM n TwmM shw joiq jwgM ]
transliteration: Na Roopan Na Rekhanndna Ranadg Na Raagadg|| Na Naamannd Na Thaamannd Mahaa Jot(i) Jaagadg||
translation: He is Formless, Signless, Colourless and Non-attached. He is Nameless, Placeless; and a Radiating Great Effulgence.

gurmukhi: n dÍYKM n ByKM inrMkwr inqMXw ] mhw jog jogM su prmM pivqXwM ]5]
transliteration: Na Dvaikhanndna Bhekhanndnirankaar Nityan|| Mahaa Jog Jouang Su Paramannd Pavityan||5||
translation: He is Blemishless, Guiseless, Formless and Eternal. He is a Superb Practising Yogi and a Supremely Holy Entity.5.

gurmukhi: AjyXM AByXM AnwmM ATwmM ] mhw jog jogM mhw kwm kwmM ]
transliteration: Ajeyan Abheyan Anaamannd Athaamannd|| Mahaa Jog Jouang Mahaa Kaam Kaamannd||
translation: He is unconquerable, Indistinguishable, Nameless and Placeless. He is a Superb Practicing Yogi, He is the Supreme Ravisher.

gurmukhi: AlyKM AByKM AnIlM AnwdM ] pryXM pivqRM sdw niRibKwdM ]6]
transliteration: Alekhanndabheyan Anoolan Anaadan|| Preyan Pavitran Sadaa Nribikhaadan||6||
translation: He is Accountless, Garbless, Stainless and without Beginning. He is in the Yond, Immaculate and ever without Contention.6.

gurmukhi: su AwdM AnwdM AnIlM AnwdM ] AdÍYKM AByKM mhysM mhMqM ]
transliteration: Su Aadan Anaadan Anoolan Anantan|| Advaikhanndabhekhanndmahesan Mahantan||
translation: He is the Primal, Orignless, Stainless and Endless. He is Blemishless, Guiseless, Master of the earth and the destroyer of Pride.
